rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule and cloakroom, designed to follow Vastu by orienting the entry on the east side for positive energy.

An open-plan living and dining area merging seamlessly with the kitchen, embodying the Chettinad style with intricate wood carvings and stone accents. The space is designed in a U-shape to encourage social interaction.

An open-plan modern yet traditional kitchen integrated into the living-dining area, featuring high-quality finishes, ample storage and a central island to foster family interactions. Care has been taken to orient work areas towards the east for Vastu compliance.
A multipurpose studio space that doubles as a workspace or relaxation area, complete with adjustable lighting and built-in storage in keeping with minimalist aesthetics.

openings.description: A large entrance door designed to invite positive energy in accordance with Vastu principles.
Balcony window offering natural light and a view of the surroundings, enhancing the living experience.
